meanings.sent1: The old car engine was gunkier than the new one.
meanings.sent2: After playing in the mud, his shoes became gunkier.
meanings.sent3: The gunkier the sandwich, the happier the raccoon!
meanings.sent4: Her room was a gunkier version of a messy art studio.
meanings.sent5: The pond water looked even gunkier after the rainstorm.

meanings.definition: Having a thicker or stickier consistency than something else.
meanings.sent1: The honey was gunkier than the syrup.
meanings.sent2: The glue became gunkier as it dried.
meanings.sent3: The gunkier slime was harder to clean up from the floor.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room felt gunkier with each passing minute.
meanings.sent5: The mud on his boots got gunkier with each step he took.
